statements: SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE clicks > 100
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE conversions >= 50 ORDER BY budget DESC
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 AND conversions < 20
SELECT campaign_name FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE clicks < 50 AND budget BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY end_date ASC
SELECT campaign_name, budget, clicks FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE conversions > 10 ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget >= 5000 AND start_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, conversions FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_name ASC, conversions DESC;
SELECT SUM(budget) AS total_budget, AVG(clicks) AS avg_clicks FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE end_date >= '2023-06-30';
SELECT campaign_name, clicks, conversions FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY clicks DESC, conversions ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM ROI_metrics;
SELECT campaign_name, engagement_metrics, conversion_rate FROM ROI_metrics;
SELECT campaign_name, conversion_rate, engagement_metrics FROM ROI_metrics;
SELECT id, campaign_name, engagement_metrics, conversion_rate FROM ROI_metrics;
SELECT campaign_name, engagement_metrics FROM ROI_metrics WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM ROI_metrics WHERE engagement_metrics > 0.5 ORDER BY campaign_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, conversion_rate FROM ROI_metrics WHERE conversion_rate > 0.1 AND engagement_metrics < 0.3;
SELECT * FROM Marketing_campaigns WHERE budget >= 50000 ORDER BY start_date ASC, end_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(conversion_rate) AS avg_conversion_rate, MAX(budget) AS max_budget FROM Marketing_campaigns GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM Marketing_campaigns WHERE budget BETWEEN 10000 AND 20000 ORDER BY budget DESC, start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_metrics ORDER BY metric_id DESC;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM chatbot_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100;
SELECT campaign_id, total_budget FROM campaign_history WHERE total_budget < 5000;
SELECT campaign_id, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM campaign_performance WHERE impressions > 1000 ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_metrics WHERE metric_name LIKE '%clicks%';
SELECT * FROM chatbot_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100 ORDER BY metric_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(impressions) AS total_impressions FROM campaign_performance GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_name, total_budget * 0.1 AS projected_profit FROM campaign_history WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM campaign_history WHERE total_budget BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, AVG(clicks) AS avg_clicks FROM campaign_performance GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING AVG(clicks) > 50;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_messages WHERE sender_id = 123;
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM chatbot_messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, clicks, impressions, conversion_rate FROM campaign_metrics WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM roi_data WHERE revenue > cost;
SELECT log_id, message_id, metric_id FROM performance_logs ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_messages WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT sender_id, message_text FROM chatbot_messages WHERE message_id = 5;
SELECT campaign_name, clicks, impressions FROM campaign_metrics WHERE conversion_rate > 0.1 ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue, AVG(cost) AS average_cost FROM roi_data WHERE profit > 10000;
SELECT message_id, metric_id, timestamp FROM performance_logs WHERE metric_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-02-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM chatbot_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM chatbot_metrics WHERE campaign_id = 2;
SELECT ad_name, impressions, clicks FROM ad_performance WHERE impressions > 1000 AND campaign_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, total_interactions FROM user_engagement ORDER BY total_interactions DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(total_spend) AS total_spend FROM campaign_performance GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING total_spend > 5000;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM chatbot_metrics WHERE campaign_id = 123 AND metric_value > 100 ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT ad_name, impressions, clicks FROM ad_performance WHERE impressions > 1000 AND clicks < 100 ORDER BY impressions DESC;
SELECT user_id, total_interactions FROM user_engagement WHERE total_interactions > 50 ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT campaign_id, start_date, end_date FROM campaign_performance WHERE total_spend > 5000 ORDER BY start_date;
